blogPost.title: What was your journey like from being a teacher to becoming an entrepreneur? Answer by @CharlesBest, founder of DonorsChoose. https://t.co/dgu2SNjmCG https://t.co/whKqkz0Zaz
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 教師から起業家になるまでの道のりはどのようなものでしたか？DonorsChooseの創設者である@CharlesBest氏の回答。https://t.co/dgu2SNjmCG https://t.co/whKqkz0Zaz
你从一名教师到成为一名企业家的过程是怎样的？回答者：@CharlesBest，DonorsChoose的创始人。https://t.co/dgu2SNjmCG https://t.co/whKqkz0Zaz
你從一名教師到成爲一名企業家的過程是怎樣的？回答者：@CharlesBest，DonorsChoose的創始人。https://t.co/dgu2SNjmCG https://t.co/whKqkz0Zaz

previous.title: What has your experience been like as a woman tech founder? Answer by @heyemilykennedy, Founder of @MarinusAI. https://t.co/kp05c6BBKQ https://t.co/JSAt3fKlMS

localize.full_text: 女性テック・ファウンダーとしての経験はどのようなものですか？Answer by @heyemilykennedy, Founder of @MarinusAI. https://t.co/kp05c6BBKQ https://t.co/JSAt3fKlMS
作为一名女性科技创始人，你的经历是怎样的？回答者：@heyemilykennedy，@MarinusAI的创始人。https://t.co/kp05c6BBKQ https://t.co/JSAt3fKlMS
作爲一名女性科技創始人，你的經歷是怎樣的？回答者：@heyemilykennedy，@MarinusAI的創始人。https://t.co/kp05c6BBKQ https://t.co/JSAt3fKlMS

next.title: What is the process for naming OPI nail polishes? Answer by Suzi Weiss-Fischmann (@1stladyofcolors), co-founder, and creative visionary behind @OPI_PRODUCTS. https://t.co/dvsIBTsphK https://t.co/7BKKnHKLER

localize.full_text: OPIのネイルポリッシュのネーミングにはどのようなプロセスがありますか？回答者：Suzi Weiss-Fischmann（@1stladyofcolors）、共同設立者、そして@OPI_PRODUCTSのクリエイティブ・ヴィジョナリー。https://t.co/dvsIBTsphK https://t.co/7BKKnHKLER
命名OPI指甲油的过程是怎样的？回答者：Suzi Weiss-Fischmann (@1stladyofcolors)，联合创始人，以及@OPI_PRODUCTS的创意者。https://t.co/dvsIBTsphK https://t.co/7BKKnHKLER
命名OPI指甲油的過程是怎樣的？回答者：Suzi Weiss-Fischmann (@1stladyofcolors)，聯合創始人，以及@OPI_PRODUCTS的創意者。https://t.co/dvsIBTsphK https://t.co/7BKKnHKLER
